movie.title: Wild Tales
movie.actors: Dario Grandinetti, Maria Marull, Monica Villa, Rita Cortese
movie.plot: Six short stories involving distressed people.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 23 wins & 36 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Wickedly hilarious and delightfully deranged, Wild Tales is a subversive satire that doubles as a uniformly entertaining anthology film.
